Argon Health
Home Features About Technology Journey Team Get Started

Revolutionizing Patient Care Through IoT Innovation

Advanced monitoring for safer healthcare during global health crises

Argon Health represents the future of patient monitoring, combining IoT technology with healthcare expertise to create a safer, more efficient monitoring system. Our solution enables medical staff to maintain high-quality care while minimizing infection risks.

Schedule a Demo

Core Features

Vital Monitoring

Continuous tracking of heart rate, body temperature, and other critical parameters with medical-grade accuracy.

Real-time Data

Instant access to patient data through our secure cloud infrastructure powered by Supabase.

Mobile Access

Intuitive FlutterFlow-based mobile application for seamless monitoring on the go.

Our Journey

Project Inception

Born from the challenges faced during the COVID-19 pandemic, two 9th-grade students envisioned a safer way to monitor patients.

Development Phase

Collaborated with mentors to develop the IoT infrastructure and mobile application interface.

Testing & Refinement

Rigorous testing and optimization of the system for maximum reliability and ease of use.

Launch & Impact

Successfully implemented the system, demonstrating its potential to transform patient care.

Technology Stack

IoT Sensors

Advanced sensors for accurate monitoring of:

  • Heart Rate
  • Body Temperature
  • Room Temperature
  • Humidity Levels

Supabase Backend

Secure, scalable database infrastructure with:

  • Real-time Updates
  • Data Encryption
  • Automated Backups
  • API Integration

FlutterFlow App

User-friendly mobile interface featuring:

  • Real-time Monitoring
  • Alert System
  • Data Visualization
  • Remote Configuration
